Game Base.descricao: Armor Sets focus on aesthetics rather than set bonuses, allowing for more freedom in Build variety, while the weight of an Armor Set plays a crucial role in determining the effectiveness of evasive maneuvers and overall combat proficiency, as lighter sets enable enhanced agility and fluidity of movement, facilitating easier and longer dodges compared to heavier sets. Bandit Set is a Light Armor Set, so you will experience fast Dodge with no Stamina cost penalty.
